TABLE.NAME: block_simplehtml
TABLE.COMMENT: Table to store data for the simple html block

FIELD.NAME: blockid
FIELD.COMMENT: Block that the simplehtml page is associated with

FIELD.NAME: pagetitle
FIELD.COMMENT: Title of the page to be displayed also used for the link the block

FIELD.NAME: displaytext
FIELD.COMMENT: Text displayed in the html page

FIELD.NAME: fileareaid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the area used to store user files

FIELD.NAME: picture
FIELD.COMMENT: The name (as a int) of the picture the user selected

FIELD.NAME: displaypicture
FIELD.COMMENT: Determines whether the selected picture is displayed or not
